main event: Several flying objects were observed visually and tracked on radar over the Pacific Ocean on 8 August 1964.
interesting points: The objects appeared as bright lights or luminous bodies moving at high speeds with erratic movements., Visual and radar contact corroborated each other, suggesting they were solid bodies and not ordinary aircraft., This case is part of a series of unusual aerial phenomena reports during military operations in the Pacific., There was no physical or photographic evidence provided in the report., The report indicates high altitude and speed of the observed objects.
sighted object: several flying objects observed as bright lights
